description:
Sitting in gridlock just isn't your thing. And few things make you smile more than cruising past a traffic jam. The Bad Boy 3 puts some serious pedal power under your feet. You have the mechanical advantage to cruise flats and climb hills with less effort. Its relaxed geometry keeps you upright and alert in busy sections. And hydraulic disc brakes provide responsive braking, even when it's a little damp out. With smooth slick tires, this road shark is ready, willing and waiting to take you to and from wherever.

  • Aluminum frame with geometry supports upright posture while riding
  • Lefty mono-fork reduces weight with only half the mass
  • Shimano Tourney 46-30T crankset gives a versatile 2x8 speed gear range
  • Shimano MT200 hydraulic disc brakes for powerful all-weather braking
  • Shimano EZ Fire EF505 shifters for rapid response gearing
  • Shimano Tourney front and Shimano Altus rear derailleurs for reliable gear changes
  • KMC Z99 chain for durable smooth drive power
  • Aluminum double walled rims for a stiff but light ride
  • 27.5 x 35C tires are grippy on pavement without too much friction
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for a year after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Bad Boy 3 Bicycle - Unisex
